''This nation faces serious challenges that will require us to renew our commitment to institutions resilient enough to lead America back,'' he will say, according to prepared remarks. I believe those are the institutions of faith, family, community and state government. To renew our nation we must have a renewal of American federalism. Mike Pence 's speech is likely to fuel further talk of a run for the White House or the governor's mansion in Indiana. The former Defence Donald Rumsfeld who also served during Richard Nixon 's presidency laid the blame for much of the failings of the Iraq war on ''too many hands on the steering wheel.''

, well-known egyptologist Zahi Hawass , on Thursday played down accounts of the break-in at the Museum and warned against ''rumours.'' In a posting on his blog Zahi Hawass said the incident at the museum resulted in 70 broken objects, all of which can be restored. ''I want people to know that after nine days of protests, the monuments are safe,'' Zahi Hawass said. ''If anything happens, I will announce it.'' Experts fret over Egypt's treasures

We have also taken account of other needs relating to overtime. As employees can not always be available, we have instituted the option of substituting up to 20% of those workers who are unable to work overtime. ''By revising the system of breaks, reducing them to 30min and monetising the difference, we have also brought ourselves into line with standard practice at factories throughout the rest of Europe and the world. Sergio Marchionne signed off his statement with a characteristic flourish, having previously hinted investment would move elsewhere unless agreement was secured at Mirafiori.
